author: andschwa
body: This resolves a part of #924, where the erase key was not working on my machine. This should resolve all cases of such platform/configuration differences, as we now compare just the ConsoleKey and Modifiers. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/931)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: This worked on Windows and my Linux box; I expect it to work anywhere `System.Console` works correctly.

title: Fix comparison of keys in dispatch dictionary
